Post-Match Reflections: Pelicans Head Coach Willie Green expressed pride in the team's effort despite the loss, emphasizing the importance of staying together and continuing to work hard.
Jordan Hawkins mentioned the challenges of dealing with injuries early in the season but stated that the team will stay together and keep their heads up.
Brandon Ingram highlighted the need to tighten up and avoid errors, emphasizing the importance of staying together as a team.
Zion Williamson acknowledged the need to find his rhythm offensively and expressed a focus on staying in the game regardless of the criticism.
Warriors Head Coach Steve Kerr praised Draymond Green's defense on Zion Williamson, noting his physicality without fouling and his ability to make it difficult for Williamson to score.
Draymond Green spoke about his defensive efforts against Zion Williamson, aiming to improve upon his performance from the previous night and earn a spot on the First Team All-Defense.
Buddy Hield highlighted Draymond Green's leadership and intangible contributions to the team, emphasizing the importance of his role in the franchise.
Trayce Jackson-Davis praised the team's defensive efforts and the coaching staff's clear instructions, noting the effectiveness of their strategies in limiting Williamson.
